ValidationRule.description: Ensures that the home number field is properly validated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( OR(ISCHANGED(Home_Number__c) && NOT(ISNULL(Home_Number__c)) && NOT(ISBLANK(Home_Number__c)) && !REGEX(Home_Number__c ,'^\\d{10,25}$'), ISNEW() && NOT(ISNULL(Home_Number__c)) && NOT(ISBLANK(Home_Number__c)) && !REGEX(Home_Number__c,'^\\d{10,25}$')),true,false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Invalid format entered for home number. The minimum number of digits should be 10
